DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the optimal dose of CHF 5259 (glycopyrrolate bromide) on top of Foster which provides the optimal additive bronchodilator effect to asthmatic patients whose symptoms are uncontrolled with medium dose of inhaled corticosteroids plus long acting beta2 agonists.
